alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 1:33AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF LIVINGSTON...SOUTHERN ERIE...WYOMING...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow will produce a quick inch or two of fluffy snow. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...A band of briefly heavy lake effect snow from Lake Huron will continue early this morning from Grand Island to downtown Buffalo, extending to near East Aurora and into central Wyoming and southern Livingston counties. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo Metro Area, Grand Island, East Aurora, Bennington, Warsaw, Castile, Dansville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 5. Interstate 90 between exits 55 and 50. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Livingston; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming
